form.official-title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to provide that extraction of helium from gas produced under a Federal mineral lease shall maintain the lease as if the helium were oil and gas.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Helium Extraction Act of 2017.

section.header: Maintenance of Federal mineral leases based on extraction of helium
section.text: The first section of the Mineral Leasing Act (30 U.S.C. 181) is amended in the fifth paragraph by inserting after purchaser thereof the following: , and that extraction of helium from gas produced from such lands shall maintain the lease as if the extracted helium were oil and gas.
